getAllAvailableSurvey

@RequestMapping(method=GET)
public java.lang.String getAllAvailableSurvey(@RequestParam(value="courseId")
                                                             java.lang.String courseId,
                                                             org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
This method will receive parameter from the web and call DAO. DAO then will open the connection to database.com and surveygizmo.com to query all available survey. After it gets all the courses the list then will be return to the web

deleteSurvey

@RequestMapping(value="/delete",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String deleteSurvey(@RequestParam(value="surveyId")
                                                    int surveyId,
                                                    @RequestParam(value="courseId")

                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model)
This method receives surveyId that coming from the web when user click delete button It will open connection to surveygizmo.com to remove the survey then return to the course detail page
